never complain the more you complain the

every sigh leads to weakness defeat and

remove the sign they are not your
friends there is better company waiting
for you all the elements of life are

the action is properly directed but when
any action is misdirected evil follows
and this is the only cause of the ills
of human existence everything that is
wrong in the world has been produced by
the perversion and the misuse of the
good therefore to eliminate wrong man
must learn to make the proper use of
those things that exist in his sphere of

both the person who does not understand
the elements in the forces of the world
in which they live will make many
mistakes and will make the wrong use of
nearly everything unless they are guided
by instructions of those who understand
the leadership of great minds is
therefore necessary to the welfare of
the race but this leadership is not
sufficient guidance from great mind will

when greater development is sought with
more complex actions the individual must
learn to match the laws of life for
themselves they can no longer depend
upon others therefore though the
leadership of greater Minds be necessary
to the welfare of the race it is also
necessary for that leadership to be used
not for keeping the multitude in a state
of simplemindedness independence but
promoting the intelligences each
individual until external guidance is
needed no more the true purpose of the
strong is to promote greater strength in

state where they are at the mercy of the
strong our United purpose should be to
develop more great men and women and to
do everything possible to lead the many
from dependence to independence every
state of individual attainment is
preceded by a childhood period but this
period should not be unnecessarily
prolonged nor will it be when every
strong mind seeks to develop strength in

understand the laws of life may inform

not prevent all the mistakes as
experience demonstrates because it
requires a certain amount of

matter how will they be guided by wiser

so-called superiors
it is therefore evident that more
understanding for everybody is the

another sign a great many people go
wrong because they do not know any
better to them a better understanding of
life is a path to emancipation they will

but the majority of those who go wrong
do not know better then why do they go
wrong the cause is lack of character
when you fail to do what you want to do
your character is weak the same is true
when you preach one thing and practice
another when you fail to be perfect as

produces misdirections and when you fail

do that you have the power to do
therefore when you fail to do it some of

affected by surroundings events
circumstance and conditions against your

offended or depressed
no one can insult them because they're

critical or resisting indicated
efficiency and character the desire to

has no fear never worries and never

give in to adversity give up in the

without any exceptions or modification
whatever that the more temper the less

mind that changes easily that is readily

lacks character a strong character
changes gradually orderly and only as

developed the more one is conscious of

nearly everything is being missed
rekted when the character is weak the
strong character is conscious only of
the right because such a character is
right and causing everything in its
sphere of action to do right to the
average person characters not important
as far as this life is concerned and as
most theological systems are declared
that it was repentance and not character
that will ensure human welfare in the
world to come the development of
character has naturally been neglected
but when we realized that it is
character that determines whether our
actions and daily life are to go right
or wrong and that every mistake is due
to a lack of character we shall feel
that the subject requires attention it
is the power of character that directs
everything that is done in the human
system or by the human system character
is a channel through which all
expressions must pass it is the
character that gives human life which
tone its color and its quality and it is
character that determines whether our
talents and our faculties are to be
their best or not the man or woman who
has a well-developed character is not
simply good they are good for something
because they have the power to turn all
their energies to good account a strong
character not only turns all the
elements and energies of life to good
account but as the power to hold the
mind in the right attitude during the
most trying moments of life so that they
will not make mistakes nor fall a victim
to insidious temptation a strong
character will keep all the faculties
and forces of life moving in the right
direction no matter what obstacle we may
meet in the way we shall turn neither to
the right nor to the left but will
continue to move directly towards the
goal we have in view and will reach that
goal without fail thousands of people
resolve every year to press on to higher
attainment and greater achievement they
begin very well but before long they are
turned off the track
they are misled or switched off by
counter attractions they have not the
character keep right on until they have
accomplished that which he originally
set out to do true it is something
wisdom to change one's plan but it is
only lack of character to change one's
plans without reason simply because
there is a change of circumstance to
change with every circumstance is to
drift with the stream of circumstance
and those who drift can only live the
life of a log they will be victim of
every external change that they ever
meet they will control little or nothing
and will accomplish little or nothing
we all can develop the power to control
circumstance or rather to cause all
circumstance to work with us and for us
in the promotion of the purpose we have
in view and this power is character
never permit circumstance to change your
plans but give so much character to your
plans that they will change circumstance
give so much character to the current of
your work that all things will be drawn
into that current and that which at
first was but a tiny rivulet will thus
be swelled into a mighty majestic stream
when the various force of the system are
properly directed and properly employed
the development of the entire mentality
will be promoted and this means
greatness the power that directs the
forces of the system is character and it
is character that causes the mind to use
these forces in the best and most
instructive manner
there must be character before there can
be to greatness because any deficiency
and character causes energy to be wasted
and misdirected it is therefore evident
that the almost universal neglect and
development of character is one of the
chief reasons why great men and women
are not as numerous as we should wish
them to be many may argue however that
great minds do not always have good
characters but also that some of our
best characters fail to manifest
exceptional ability but we must remember
that there is a vast difference between
that phase of character that simply
tries to follow the moral law and real
character the character that actually is
justice virtue and truth then we must
also remember that character does not
mean simply obedience to a certain group
of laws but the power to use properly
all the laws of life that person who
uses mental powers properly but fails to
comply with moral laws does not possess
a complete character nevertheless the
character of this person is just as good
as that of the person who follows moral
laws while constantly violating mental
laws in the study of character it is
very important to know that the
violation of mental laws is just as
detrimental as the violation of moral
laws though we have been in the habit of
condemning the ladder and excusing the
former that person who uses properly the
mental laws will to a degree promote the
development of the mind even though they
may neglect the moral laws and this
accounts for the fact that a number of
minds have attained a far degree of
greatness in spite of their
weakness but it is a fact of extreme
importance that those Minds who obtain
greatness in spite of their moral
weakness could become 2 or 3 times as
great if they had also develop moral
strength that person who complies with
the mental laws but who violates the
moral laws wastes fully one-half of the
energies of their mind and sometimes
more their attainment and achievement
will therefore be less than one-half of
what they might be if they had moral
character as well as mental character
the same is true however of that person
who complies with the moral laws but who
violates the mental laws fully one-half
of their energy is wasted in misdirected
this explains why the so-called good
characters are not any more brilliant
than the rest for though they may be
morally good they are not always
mentally good that is they do not use
their minds according to the laws of
mind and therefore cannot rise above the
level of the ordinary the true character
tries to turn all the energy of the
system into the best and most
constructive channels and it is the mark
of a real character when all the various
parts of the beam of man are working
together harmoniously for the building
of greatness in mind and soul when the
character is weak there is more or less
conflict among the mental actions
certain actions have a tendency to work
for one thing while other actions are
tending to produce the very opposite the
same is true of the desires a character
that lacks development will desire one
thing today and something else tomorrow
plans will change constantly and little
or nothing will be accomplished in the
strong character Oliver all actions work
in harmony and all actions are
constructive and this is natural because
it is the one supreme function of
character to make all actions in a human

in a human life a building force and a
